DOC.brief_summary: This multi-centre study Singapore nursing home , investigate factor affect deprescribing , team-care base deprescribing standard practice give superior health pharmacoeconomic outcome current medication review practice .
DOC.criteria: For interview questionnaire : Inclusion criterion : 1 . Accepted informed consent , 2 . The healthcare professional practicing involve nursing home . Exclusion criterion : 1 ) Decline/unable provide consent . For teamcare deprescribing study : Inclusion criterion : 1 . Accepted informed consent ( unless cognitiveimpaired , uncontactable nextofkin ) , 2 . Adult age 65 year , 3 . Currently five medication . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Below age 65 year age , 2 . Life expectancy le 6 month respite care .
